ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( !ISBLANK( TEXT (PRIORVALUE(RW_Closing_Head__c))), ISCHANGED( RW_Closing_Head__c),$Profile.Name <> "System Administrator",$Profile.Name <> "Sales Strategy", $Profile.Name <> 'SAdmin' , $Label.Disable_all_validations_from_opp == "false" /*Added by Prashant to control disabling all validations together*/)
